content.content: @GriffGreen’s Fund Recovery Session I notes are here: Fund Recovery Session I - 4:00pm Saturday I have very light notes from Session II. There were in particular some interesting points made about using a social contract. If anyone has notes from this, please post them here!  Fund Recovery Session II 11:30am Sunday Social contract: we expect this to be a regular thing Modification of the ERP (Ether Recovery Process):  to incorporate a social contract to incorporate a deadline, phases to incorporate community signals  Signaling functions to increase communication Potentially other governance functions
